channel.title: Data Science LAB on VJ-Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science LAB on VJ-Data Science

item.title: Market Basket Analysis
item.description: Github Repository: Results: Performed market basket analysis using association rules to identify strongly related items from 150,000 transactions records dataset and generate recommendations. Generated list of most popular items, pair of strongly related items which is purchased together with confidence of 86% and max lift of 7. Implementing these recommendation were helpful in item placing decision, stock refilling, target items list thus increasing significant revenue.

item.title: Salary Estimate Project
item.description: Github Repository: Results: Developed a machine learning solution that can predict salary of a candidate when years of experience, job type, college degree, college major, industry, and miles from a metropolis is given. Performed EDA to explore datasets using Python Pandas, numpy, matplotlib. Implemented multiple linear regression models to find the most significant variables, and applying second order of polynomial transformation to the features gave us better RMSE of 354 with accuracy about 76%.

item.title: Customer Segmentation Using RFM
item.description: An Insurance Company does 4 RSVP marketing campaigns in a year, and it is the major event to launch a new product and get many potential leads. However in year 2018 they had a success rate of 3% only. Performed a detailed descriptive analysis on existing customer data, and created 4 customer segment using RFM analysis which could score every potential prospect based on his demographic data, and we increased conversion rate to 6% in 2019.
